channel.title: Thieving Hits Delta

item.title: Thieving Hits Delta
item.dc:creator: @dawwn dawwn
item.description:
@dawwn wrote:

I already coded thieving into my server, now I just canâ€™t simply add hits to getting stunned. When I get stunned how can I make it so I get hit a 1?

Here is my code of getting stunned while thieving

} if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(misc.random(3)==1){ sM("You fail to pickpocket the "+NPCNAME+"."); stillgfx(348, absY, absX); setAnimation(881); actionInterval = 5000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); return; }
